labels.analysis: The MCP Server provides tools to access and interact with GitHub repositories, allowing users to browse and read files directly. This facilitates access to code, documentation, or other content hosted on GitHub via URI navigation. The primary functionality revolves around repository access and file interaction, with optional authentication for enhanced functionality.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Development Tools" was chosen because the server's core function supports developers and users who need to interact with code repositories. The secondary label "API Integration" was added because accessing GitHub repositories typically involves API interactions. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently describe the server's functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: GitHub Repository Access Server
server_info_crawled.author: @loglmhq/mcp-server-github-repo
server_info_crawled.overview: Browse and read files from specified GitHub repositories effortlessly. Access any file in a repository via URI and navigate directories with ease. Enhance your AI assistants with the ability to interact with GitHub content directly.

tools.name: Optional Settings
tools.description: Access and manage servers by signing in.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@loglmhq/mcp-server-github-repo/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: githubPersonalAccessToken
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: GitHub Personal Access Token for accessing the repository
